query.name: Pre-Cleanup - Remove Previous Test Data
query.description: Ensures clean state by removing any leftover objects from previous failed runs
query.query: DROP USER IF EXISTS 'test_user_1'@'%'; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS revoke_test_db

query.name: Create Test Database and Users
query.description: Creates test database and 100 test users for REVOKE testing
query.query: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS revoke_test_db; USE revoke_test_db; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100))

query.name: Grant Initial Privileges to Test Users
query.description: Grant SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE privileges to test users for baseline testing
query.query: GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'TestPass123'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline REVOKE Hour 1
query.description: Hour 1 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on SELECT privilege
query.query: REVOKE SELECT ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline REVOKE Hour 2
query.description: Hour 2 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on INSERT privilege
query.query: REVOKE INSERT ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT INSERT ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline REVOKE Hour 3
query.description: Hour 3 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on UPDATE privilege
query.query: REVOKE UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline REVOKE Hour 4
query.description: Hour 4 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on DELETE privilege
query.query: REVOKE DELETE ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT DELETE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: ANOMALY SPIKE - Massive REVOKE Operations
query.description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: 1000 rapid REVOKE operations - 20x normal rate indicating privilege escalation attack or insider threat
query.query: REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Verify REVOKE Operations
query.description: Verify user privileges after REVOKE operations
query.query: SELECT user, host FROM mysql.user WHERE user LIKE 'test_user_%' LIMIT 10

query.name: Cleanup Test Users and Database
query.description: Remove test users and database after verification
query.query: DROP USER IF EXISTS 'test_user_1'@'%'; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS revoke_test_db
